body.p:
Mt Vernon Rockcastle cty Ky
July 13, 1864,
Dear Governor

Your old friend and fellow soldier John Rucker was fined in the Rockcastle circuit Court ^at the last Feby Term^ on two several Indictement one for tiplin & the other for unlawful Gaming, the fine Tipling is $60, and for gameing is $20,

He appeals to your clemency again as he has done on several former occasions
to have the aforsaid fines remetted,

He says he had a valid defense in both cases, but he was unable to be at court, owing to the fact that he cundcting a waggon traine train at the time of court which made in impossible for him to attend court,
He says he great confidence that you will not suffer him to be harassed by the offices, in the collections of these fines, yours affectionately

Jas C, Jones
W. A. Brooks

Rockcastle Ct Ct
vs
John Rucker
